name: Dealer Enablement Agent
tagline: Empowers dealers with instant access to sales and service knowledge
overview: The Dealer Enablement Agent provides dealers with quick access to product information, pricing guidance, inventory availability, and sales tools. It helps dealer staff answer customer questions, configure solutions, and close deals faster with accurate, up-to-date information.
whatItDoes: Answers product and specification questions instantly
Provides pricing and promotion guidance within policies
Checks inventory availability across the network
Assists with product configuration and selection
Delivers competitive positioning and differentiation points
prompts: What's the fuel economy difference between X15 and X12 for this application?
Is there current inventory for a 500hp ISX15 in the Southeast?
What rebates are available for fleet customers this quarter?
How does our warranty compare to the competition?
Help me configure the right engine for a regional haul application

impact.description: Better support for dealer sales teams

guardrails: Pricing guidance within published policiesâ€”no autonomous discounting
Competitive information from approved sources only
Customer-specific agreements require sales manager review
Does not commit inventory or make binding quotes
Escalates complex configurations to Cummins sales support
whatsNext: Developing concept with dealer council feedback. Defining integration with dealer portal systems.
